data.event: Pura is first mentioned around 751-760, though this is found in a 17th Century copy of the original.
The village was part of the Agno parish until 1603 when it became a separate parish.
The parish church of San Martino was first mentioned in 1352.
It was rebuilt in 1580 and expanded between 1642 and 1658.

event.title: the 1960s, a strong construction boom began

data.event: In the 1960s, a strong construction boom began.
